topic.title: HPE Helion Development Platform 2.0: The clouds.yaml Configuration File

body.p: The installer gets its configuration information from the ~/.config/openstack/clouds.yaml file.
Note that although the sections are separated here — one for each service — there is only one clouds.yaml file. A sample of a complete file.
Information on each field follows the code block. For highly-detailed information, see the OpenStack client configuration documentation.

ol.li: Create a plaintext file called clouds.yaml in that directory.
Enter the configuration information for the service(s) being installed, as detailed below.
